neatco.title: Neatco Utility Tool
neatco.desc:
A multipurpose CLI application which allows the employees to view / upload annotations files and images of Neatco’s CV units, which are stored in Neatco’s AWS bucket(s).
Other options include setting up email automation and Semi-Automatic image annotation in CVAT.

neatco.title: Annotation Utility Web app
neatco.desc: A web application which allows Neatco’s customers to view images of stations and upload / download annotation files. Uses Neatco Utility Tools’ CLI under the hood.

neatco.title: Crash Monitor
neatco.desc: An standalone python script which monitors certain processes and makes sure that they are re-started if they ever crash. It can also alert the operator, collect logs and also terminate orphan processes.

neatco.title: Neatco’s website
neatco.desc: Rewrite Neatco’s website using code rather than a site builder.

saimaan.title: DastSaaz
saimaan.desc: Developed and implemented a RESTful API for an online marketplace specializing in handmade products.

saimaan.title: Shukul
saimaan.desc: Created and maintained a RESTful API for an online store specializing in pastry and confectionery products.

saimaan.title: PishroTire
saimaan.desc: Designed and developed a RESTful API for an online store specializing in automobile tires.

saimaan.title: Khanomito
saimaan.desc: Developed a RESTful API for an online store featuring handmade products and foods crafted by women.

others.title: GMB
others.desc: A telegram bot (using Telegram Bot API) which moderates pre-defined Telegram groups.

others.title: TCB Bot
others.desc: A telegram bot (using Telegram Bot API) which aggregates cryptocurrency signal messages it receives, performs text operations on them and sends them to destination channels.

others.title: TCB Daemon
others.desc: A daemon (using Telegram TDLib API) which gathers messages from channels which the user has subscribed to, based on several criteria, and forwards them to the TCB Bot.
tags: Typescript (Runtime: Node.js) packaged into an executable
